item.description:
Hello all,

We're going to try something a little different at our April meetup. This month's meetup is focused on matching developers and engineers with entrepreneurs.

At our recent meetups, many entrepreneurs have voiced the need to find exceptional developers and technical co-founders. With that in mind, I'd like to invite developers/engineers that are interested in working on start-ups or co-founding a start-up to attend, bring friends, and bring something to showcase your expertise such as a resume or functioning work samples.

If you are an entrepreneur looking for an engineer or a technical co-founder, this should be a good opportunity to promote your start-up and hopefully convince some great engineering talent to join you.

Recap:

  • The April Meetup is about matching engineers/developers with entrepreneurs
  • Engineers/developers: bring resumes, work samples, friends
  • Entrepreneurs: bring a good product pitch to help you recruit great engineering talent


When and where:
The April WebSquared meetup is this Thursday, April 29, starting at 8PM at the Cambridge Brewing Company. We usually have a table or two in the front, to the left of the bar.

I hope to see you there, and I hope we can make some connections happen!

Cheers!
Sergio
item.name: WebSquared April Meetup - Matching Engineers with Entrepreneurs
